document.full_text: pakistan raised fuel prices by up to 13 percent friday, reflecting the rise in global crude prices, but political parties were quick to reject the move that could stir fresh anger due to fears over sharply rising costs of living.
document.title: pakistan hikes fuel prices
lines_and_colors: pakistan raised fuel prices by up to 13 percent friday, reflecting the rise in global crude prices, but political parties were quick to reject the move that could stir fresh anger due to fears over sharply rising costs of living.
